resources.string:
JA Real Estate is the premiere real estate agency on Kingston on Thames specializing in quality and waterfront homes.

 For over 35 years we have been proud to represent the best the area has to offer, in doing so, help countless families find the homes of their dreams. 

 We have an outstanding group of full time professional sales associates at your service. JA Real Estate offers sellers and buyers services that include: 

· Multiple Listing Service 
· Full Broker Services 
· Buyer representation/Seller representation 
· Residential, multi-family, rural, commercial 
· We buy homes and land for cash
